name: quack-marketplace
description: Official Quack marketplace - productivity plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: quack-brain
plugins.description: Complete Second Brain system with file-based knowledge, Mermaid diagrams, code breadcrumbs, Human Guides, and Obsidian integration

plugins.name: idea-validator
plugins.description: Brutally honest validation of app ideas before building

plugins.name: brand-guidelines
plugins.description: Quack design system with UI patterns, colors, typography, and components

plugins.name: discord-community-manager
plugins.description: Expert Discord community manager for developer communities

plugins.name: apatr-d
plugins.description: Analyze-Plan-Act-Test-Review-Document development workflow

plugins.name: use-quack-brain
plugins.description: Rule for using Quack Brain with Access Chain, knowledge management, and code breadcrumbs

plugins.name: code-graph-mcp
plugins.description: AST-powered code graph with definitions, references, caller/callee analysis, and complexity metrics across 25+ languages via MCP server

plugins.name: project-manager
plugins.description: Project Manager agent - plans, evaluates feasibility, coordinates quality

plugins.name: product-manager
plugins.description: Product Manager agent - UX, feature prioritization, market fit

plugins.name: marketing-comms
plugins.description: Marketing & Communication agent - brand voice, content strategy, community, product marketing, positioning, GTM

plugins.name: personal-assistant
plugins.description: Personal Assistant agent - research, organizing, summarizing, general tasks

plugins.name: vue-nuxt-developer
plugins.description: Vue/Nuxt Developer agent with Vue 3, Nuxt 3, Pinia, and VueUse best practices

plugins.name: angular-developer
plugins.description: Angular Developer agent with Signals, modern component patterns, and routing

plugins.name: flutter-developer
plugins.description: Flutter Developer agent with widget patterns, state management, and navigation

plugins.name: python-backend
plugins.description: Python Backend Developer agent with async patterns, testing, and FastAPI

plugins.name: rust-systems
plugins.description: Rust Systems Developer agent with async patterns, memory safety, and error handling

plugins.name: devops-cloud
plugins.description: DevOps & Cloud Engineer agent with Cloudflare Workers, Turborepo, and GitHub Actions

plugins.name: react-nextjs-developer
plugins.description: React/Next.js Developer agent with React 19, Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Vitest

plugins.name: swift-ios-developer
plugins.description: Swift/iOS Developer agent with SwiftUI, Swift Concurrency, iOS architecture, and Apple HIG best practices

plugins.name: openai-image-gen
plugins.description: Generate images using OpenAI's GPT Image API with support for multiple models, sizes, and transparent backgrounds

plugins.name: learn-from-web
plugins.description: Learn any technology from its website or documentation URL and turn it into a reusable Claude skill

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Meta-skill for creating new Claude skills with proper structure, bundled resources, and packaging scripts

plugins.name: docs-manager
plugins.description: Documentation Manager agent - Brain-powered knowledge curation with ADRs, audits, cross-referencing, and health checks

plugins.name: delegation-rule
plugins.description: Structured decision tree for Agent Teams vs Subagents vs single-agent execution

plugins.name: pdf-toolkit
plugins.description: Complete PDF manipulation toolkit - extract text/tables, create documents, merge/split, fill forms, OCR, and CLI tools

plugins.name: brain-migrate
plugins.description: Migrate existing documentation into Quack Brain v2 format with automatic classification, Mermaid conversion, and CLAUDE.md integration

plugins.name: agent-browser
plugins.description: Browser automation CLI for AI agents - navigate pages, fill forms, click buttons, take screenshots, extract data, and automate any browser task via Playwright

plugins.name: medium-writer
plugins.description: Write and publish high-performing Medium articles with data-driven title formulas, SEO optimization, publishing timing, and automated draft creation via agent-browser
